AMRN everybody just take a deep breathe and relax Do not let the price action today get to youThis was bound to happen after the huge surge yesterday Profit taking was bound to happen The stock sold for and the price fell Profit taking happens for all stocks whether Fb Appl or AMZN So Amrn is not immune to this factorBut the long term story of the stock is not affected It will rise again nice again and before u know it it will not happen It will not only touch its 52 week high but it will go above and beyond that Please note even big companies like Appl and Fb have pulled back quite a bit and so has the Dow Its lifetime time 52 week high is 26951 and it is currently at 25000 So along with the Dow coming back and a ease of trade sanctions with China Amrn too will come back big and strongSo please be patient It was the same company today that it was yesterday and nothing has changed in these past 24 hours Except for big firms on Wall Street doing profit taking

HDGabor i h u b POST re AMRN Adcom I said expect no AdCom 1 First of all I do not expect a second letter Day 74 Letter it was that Day 74 letter will serve as notification to the applicant that the review division intends to conduct an expedited review and they wont issue a no AdCom letter 2 PDUFA goal date September 28 2019 3 The AdCom should be no later than 6 weeks priority review prior to the PDUFA goal date means no later than August 17 4 FDA intend to notify the sponsor that they are taking an issue directly relevant to the sponsor to an advisory committee 55 business days before the AdCom means May 31 I am 9999 that if they would like to hold an AdCom they included it in the received Day 74 letter of course they could change their mind till COB May 31 PDUFA REAUTHORIZATION PERFORMANCE GOALS AND PROCEDURES FISCAL YEARS 2018 THROUGH 2022
